title: Customer Billing Dispute
description: An agent must resolve a customer's claim of being overcharged by checking their usage history and plan details.

tasks.description: Acknowledge customer complaint and retrieve account details using the provided customer ID.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully greets the customer and pulls up the correct account using the provided identifier.

tasks.description: Analyze usage data against the customer's plan to find the source of the high charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the source of the high charge (e.g., data overage, international calls).

tasks.description: Explain the charge to the customer and offer a one-time courtesy credit if applicable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the reason for the charge and correctly applies a tool to issue a credit.
